title: A note of appreciation
author: VD
content_html: I have to thank both Si and Sarah, who were quite helpful in providing material for next week’s column, entitled The Axis of Liberal. I’d forgotten just how perfectly poisonous dear old Jean-Jacques could be.
content_text:
I have to thank both Si and Sarah, who were quite helpful in providing material for next week’s column, entitled
The Axis of Liberal
.  I’d forgotten just how perfectly poisonous dear old Jean-Jacques could be.
